name: Keep Bouncin'
description:
Keep Bouncin to the beat while avoiding hazards in multiple digital landscapes. Tap the screen to spike the music ball while collecting stars to unlock new skins and complete challenging levels.

 Features:

• A 2D Ball Bouncing game • Single tap functionality.
• Multiple hand crafted levels with unique environments and music.
• Collectible stars to unlock new customizations.
• Smooth neon lit animations.
• Level select for additional replayability.
• Easy to play, hard to master.
